summary: If you love colour like me this is the guide for you! Only take 5 Min and it looks like The Witcher 2 a bit!
descriptionHtml:
Hellow this is mine mini guide to get a super colorful skyrim. You need 2 things for this first:

The FXAA Post Process Injector by some_dude
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=131&navtag=file/images.php?id=131&tab=3

AND

ULTRA REALISTIC WORLD LIGHTING by Marco
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13531

So now the guide:

1: Install the FXXA PPI 
2: Set the settings in the FXXA like the txtfile you download with this guide.
3: Install URWL and you are done!

If you want your skyrim even more pretty download:
Skyrim HD
Static Mesh Improvment
W.A.T.E.R
Skyrim Rocks And Snow HD

Have a fun time with your super sexy colourful skyrim!
I have uploaded 3 screens but if you want more just download the Screen package! 
(Btw IÂ´m from Sweden so i are a real viking so dont hate on this or you wake up dead, haha)
author: Guide_ Plosen97
